channel.title: Changeling page outdated with Eberron Rising War's update to race!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Changeling page outdated with Eberron Rising War's update to race!" - Eberron Rising War saw many changeling racial changes, including entirely removed racial traits, a different ability score choice, and wording changes.

item.title: Re: Changeling page outdated with Eberron Rising War's update to race!
item.content:encoded: the page has been updated to match the ERftLW and has completely differentiated it from the UA. an accurate source for the UA has also been provided. let me know if there's anything else on there that needs to be changed!

item.title: Re: Changeling page outdated with Eberron Rising War's update to race!
item.content:encoded: I think it would be better to further separate the UA features from the ERftLW features since, at the moment, the base features use wording from the UA even though it is different in ERftLW. Also Change Appearance should be Shapechanger for the ERftLW version and the errata affecting the Ability Score Increase still needs to be included.

item.title: Re: Changeling page outdated with Eberron Rising War's update to race!
item.content:encoded: I think you guys did a fantastic job! The current layout is quite clear, and shows the options for players to select from. :D Mad props.

item.title: Re: Changeling page outdated with Eberron Rising War's update to race!
item.content:encoded: Wouldnt it be better to have a page for the old changeling alongside the new changeling? I personally prefer the old one and have a character that uses it, so having the stats for both could be good

item.title: Re: Changeling page outdated with Eberron Rising War's update to race!
item.content:encoded:
Hey! The changeling page has just been updated to the current published version!

Sorry it's taken so long, but thanks for pointing it out! I always appreciate when people catch stuff, it's too much for me to regualrly check.

item.title: Changeling page outdated with Eberron Rising War's update to race!
item.content:encoded: Many things got changed: ability score became +2 CHA and +1 to any, Unsettling Visage and Divergent Persona removed, and some other stuff. Can't edit it as a normal user but just wanted to let you guys know because wikidot is often a go-to source for people. Plus it's the first result on google!!!
